name: WordPress Ultimate Gallery
author: WordPress Ultimate Gallery

sections.description:
WP Ultimate Gallery is an AWESOME minimalist gallery plugin for your WordPress website. This plugin creates unlimited gallery & not only gallery, you can enable those.

Gallery Type

  • Thumbnail gallery with lightbox
  • AJAX Pagination
  • Masonry Gallery
  • Infinite scroll
  • Slideshow
  • Carousel
  • FilmStrip Gallery – NEW

Click on each link to see demo.

See documentation here.

Features

  • Video support
  • Custom link support
  • Lightweight
  • Mobile friendly
  • Option panel
  • Easy to use

Special Thanks

Plugin icon & banner designed by Tushar
Saveral Bug report & help for fixing – Md. Nurullah
sections.installation:
Using this plugin is VERY easy. Lets do in three steps:

  1. Just install via Plugin > Add new & search from WP directory. Or use upload method.
  2. Create gallery, upload images & save it! Get shortcode!
  3. Use the shortcode on page, posts or widgets! Even via `do_shortcode` method ðŸ˜‰

That’s all for today! Easy enough!

Contact with us if you are in any trouble. We are happy to help you.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First Release

1.1

  • Added support for older version of PHP, Fixed an Issue.

1.2

  • Fixed owl carousel conflict.

1.3

  • Improved UI
  • Added Filmstrip Gallery
  • Improved Option Panel

1.4

  • Changed image resized library.
  • Fixed a CSS bug.

1.5

  • Fixed autoplay field on general layout.
  • Added ascending & descending feature.

1.6

  • Added caption feature.
  • Enabled ability to disable image crop feature on individual gallery.

1.7

  • Added isotope feature

short_description: This plugin enable multi style gallery in your wordpress site.
